mapper.select: SELECT PROJ_NAME, WBS_ID, WBS_NAME, WBS_CONENT, WBS_START_DATE, WBS_END_DATE, WBS_MANAGER, WBS_FIN_DATE FROM WBS_VIEW WHERE PROJ_NAME= (SELECT PROJ_NAME FROM PROJMEMLIST WHERE MEM_ID=#{memId}) AND WBS_FIN_DATE = ' '

SELECT PROJ_NAME, WBS_ID, WBS_NAME, WBS_CONENT, WBS_START_DATE, WBS_END_DATE, WBS_MANAGER, WBS_FIN_DATE FROM WBS_VIEW WHERE PROJ_NAME= (SELECT PROJ_NAME FROM PROJMEMLIST WHERE MEM_ID=#{memId}) AND WBS_FIN_DATE != ' '
